He attended [[Heritage Hills High School]] in [[Lincoln City, Indiana]] where he played [[quarterback]]; he also starred in [[basketball]] and [[baseball]]. After graduating from Heritage Hills, he went on to the [[University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign|University of Illinois]] where he was [[redshirt (college sports)|redshirt]]ed for a year (1990) before becoming a four-year [[Letterman (sports)|letterman]] and three-year [[Starting lineup|starter]] as a [[tight end]]. He was named All-[[Big Ten]] in 1991 (Honorable Mention) by the Big Ten coaches and in 1994 (2nd Team) by the coaches and media.
